body_html: The error message is not about where you call autograd.grad but about not using a Tensor that requires grad to differentiate by. As this is not a bug, I think you'll get better advice in the PyTorch forum than here.
body_text: The error message is not about where you call autograd.grad but about not using a Tensor that requires grad to differentiate by. As this is not a bug, I think you'll get better advice in the PyTorch forum than here.
body: The error message is not about where you call `autograd.grad` but about not using a Tensor that requires grad to differentiate by. As this is not a bug, I think you'll get better advice in the [PyTorch forum](https://discuss.pytorch.org/) than here.
